ingredients: 2   +   1/2 cups water, 1 cup rolled oats, 1 tablespoon white sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, 2  bananas, sliced, 1 pinch ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 cup cold milk (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 2mg 1%, Sodium 600mg 26%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 12g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 5mg 26%, Calcium 57mg 4%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 333mg 7%
